title: Xin Zhao's reworked ultimate should remove shields on enemies.
body: **We currently have no ability in the game that can break or remove shields. Why not give it to THE duelist champion? We gave a dash stopping ability to THE peel champion {{champion:78}}  and we made THE antimage actually scale well with mr {{champion:3}} , we cant we make THE demacian duelist remove shields from people so they have to fight him on their own terms?**

No, you're simply strawmaning me. 

His ult, as now, and in most forms I could imagine is a skill shot, that takes time to travel, while also being rather short range, as it originates from Xin himself.  It can be avoided with a well timed dash, or blink (including Flash) as well as proper positioning; the people most benefited by shield tend to be in the backline, and would likely be far out of range, provided their frontline is actively locking down or peeling the enemy team. I would not say it is unreasonable to expect carries to be able to avoid the ult in a teamfight, unless already caught out.
